info.title: Mail
info.description: [Zoom Mail API](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/zoom-mail/) access mailbox data for your apps. Build private and public offerings on the [Zoom App Marketplace](https://marketplace.zoom.us/) with RESTful APIs. Dive into [OAuth](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth/) docs for credential acquisition and app creation.

get.description:
Lists the draft messages in the mailbox.
**Prerequisites**:
* Account must have Workplace Business or higher license type.
* Account must have enabled Zoom Mail Service and finished Mail Service Onboarding Flow.
* Mail service End-To-End Encryption is disabled.
* Requested mailbox must have been provisioned.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `mail:read`,`mail:read:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `email:read:list_drafts`,`email:read:list_drafts:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

**Not supported in Gov cluster**

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The mailbox address, or special value "me" to indicate the primary mailbox for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: includeSpamTrash
parameters.description: Include messages from SPAM and TRASH in the results. Value should be either "true" or "false".

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of drafts to return. This field defaults to 50. The maximum allowed value for this field is 500.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: Page token to retrieve a specific page of results in the list.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Specify a server side elastic search query.

200.description: The response body contains list of drafts in the mailbox.

id.description: The immutable ID of the draft.
The immutable ID of the message.

threadId.description: The ID of the thread the message belongs to.

message.description: The message info of the draft.

nextPageToken.description: Token to retrieve the next page of results in the list.

resultSizeEstimate.description: Estimated number of results in the response.

post.description:
Sends the specified draft. 
**Prerequisites**:
* Account must have Workplace Business or higher license type.
* Account must have enabled Zoom Mail Service and finished Mail Service Onboarding Flow.
* Mail service End-To-End Encryption is disabled.
* Requested mailbox must have been provisioned.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `mail:write`,`mail:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `email:write:send_draft`,`email:write:send_draft:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

**Not supported in Gov cluster**

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The mailbox address, or special value "me" to indicate the primary mailbox for the authenticated user.

requestBody.description: The request body contains an instance of draft.

id.description: The immutable ID of the draft to identify which draft email will be used to send.  If addition, if request body contains the "message" object, the message content will be used to update the draft before it is sent out.

raw.description: The entire email message in an RFC 2822 formatted and base64url encoded string. If request body contains the "message" object, the message content will be used to update the draft before it is sent out.

message.description: The message content of the draft.

200.description: The response body contains an instance of message object.  **Note**: The message object contains only the ID, thread ID and label IDs.

id.description: The immutable ID of the message.  When a draft is sent, the message copy will be processed and put into SCHEDULED folder for system delay in case user want to cancel, and eventually move to SENT folder.

threadId.description: The immutable thread ID of the sent message.

labelIds.description: List of label IDs on the message.

items.description: One of the label IDs on the message.

get.summary: List history of events for mailbox
get.description:
Lists the history of the changes to the given mailbox.
**Prerequisites**:
* Account must have Workplace Business or higher license type.
* Account must have enabled Zoom Mail Service and finished Mail Service Onboarding Flow.
* Mail service End-To-End Encryption is disabled.
* Requested mailbox must have been provisioned.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `mail:read`,`mail:read:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `email:read:history`,`email:read:history:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

**Not supported in Gov cluster**

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The mailbox address, or special value "me" to indicate the primary mailbox for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of history events to return. This field defaults to 50. The maximum allowed value is 500.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: The page token to retrieve a specific page of results in the list.

parameters.name: startHistoryId
parameters.description: Returns history records after the specified `startHistoryId`. The supplied `startHistoryId` should be obtained from the `historyId` of a message, thread, or previous list response. History IDs increase chronologically but are not contiguous with random gaps in between. Supplying an invalid or out of date `startHistoryId` typically returns an HTTP 404 error code. A `historyId` is typically valid for at least a week, but in some rare circumstances may be valid for much shorter period. If you receive an HTTP 404 error response, your application should perform a full sync. If you receive no **nextPageToken** in the response, there are no updates to retrieve and you can store the returned `historyId` for a future request.

parameters.name: historyTypes
parameters.description: History types to be returned by the function.  If one history type included in both query parameters``historyType`` and ``excludeHistoryType``, the exclude take the priority.

parameters.name: excludeHistoryTypes
parameters.description: History types not to be returned by the function.  If one history type included in both query parameters ``historyTypes`` and ``excludeHistoryTypes``, the exclude take the priority.

parameters.name: labelId
parameters.description: Only return messages with a label matching the ID.

200.description: Lists of all the changes of the mailbox such as message append, label change, settings change, etc.  The changes are in chronical order (increase of the history ID).

history.description: List of history records. Any messages contained in the response will typically only have ID and thread ID fields populated.

id.description: The mailbox history event sequence ID.

cid.description: Client ID which uniquely identifies a client (zoom.app)â€™s running session that initiated the change.

messagesAdded.description: History event indicate a message added to the mailbox.

id.description: Email message ID.

labelIds.description: Label IDs of the newly added message.

threadId.description: Email thread ID.

message.description: Email message that has been operated on.

messagesDeleted.description: History event indicates message deleted (not Trashed) from the mailbox.

id.description: Email message ID.

labelIds.description: Label IDs of the deleted message.

threadId.description: Email thread ID.

message.description: Email message that has been operated on.

messagesImported.description: History event indicates a message imported from the external source into this mailbox.

id.description: Email message ID.

labelIds.description: Label IDs of the imported message.

threadId.description: Email thread ID.

message.description: Email message that has been operated on.

messagesImportedNew.description: History event indicates a message imported from the external source that was newly delivered since last round of import.

id.description: Email message ID.

labelIds.description: Label IDs of the imported message.

threadId.description: Email thread ID.

message.description: Email message that has been operated on.

messagesUpdated.description: History event indicates an existing message that has been updated.

id.description: Email message ID.

labelIds.description: Label IDs of the updated message.

threadId.description: Email thread ID.

message.description: Email message that has been operated on.

labelsAdded.description: History event indicates some labels are added to messages.

labelIds.description: Label IDs that being added to the messages

id.description: Email message ID.

labelIds.description: Label IDs of the message.

threadId.description: Email thread ID.

message.description: Email message that has been operated on.

labelsRemoved.description: History event indicates some labels are removed from messages.

labelIds.description: List of label IDs that have been removed from the message.

id.description: Email message Id.

labelIds.description: Label IDs of the message.

threadId.description: Email thread Id.

message.description: Email message that has been operated on.

settingsAdded.description: Newly added setting list in this history record.  Each enement contains a setting type, and that setting ID if applicable.  This type of history event is mainly for adding user labels, filter, etc.

id.description: ID of the changing setting if the setting is of mutlple entries type.

settingsDeleted.description: Deleted setting list in this history record.  Each enement contains a setting type, and that setting ID if applicable.  This type of history event is mainly for delete user labels, filters, etc.

id.description: ID of the changing setting if the setting is of mutlple entries type.

settingsUpdated.description: Updated setting list in this history record.  Each enement contains a setting type, and a setting ID if applicable.

id.description: ID of the changing setting if the setting is of mutlple entries type.

delegatesAdded.description: History event indicates mailbox access has been granted to these delegates.

items.description: Email address of the delegate that has been granted access

delegatesDeleted.description: History event indicates mailbox access has been revoked from these delegates.

items.description: Email address of the delegate that has been revoked access.

delegatesUpdated.description: History event indicates mailbox access level has been modified for these delegates.

items.description: Email address of the delegate that has access setting has been updated.

delegatorsAdded.description: History event indicates user has been granted access to these delegators' mailboxes.

items.description: Email address of the delegator that this user has been granted access to.

delegatorsDeleted.description: History event indicates user has been revoked access from these delegators' mailboxes.

items.description: Email address of the delegator that this user has been revoked access from.

delegatorsUpdated.description: History event indicates user's delegate access level has been modified to these delegators' mailboxes.

items.description: Email address of the delegator that this user has been modified access.

nextPageToken.description: The page token to retrieve the next page of results in the list.

historyId.description: The ID of the mailbox's latest history event.

endTime.description: An optional end time for sending auto-replies (epoch ms). When this is specified, server will automatically reply only to messages that it receives before the end time. If both startTime and endTime are specified, startTime must precede endTime.
